title: Initial Search Results: Open-Source Graphics APIs
body_html:
• Wikipedia's List of 3D Graphics Libraries: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_3D_graphics_libraries
  • Awesome Graphics Libraries (GitHub): https://github.com/jslee02/awesome-graphics-libraries
  • LVGL (Light and Versatile Embedded Graphics Library): https://lvgl.io/
  • Skia: https://skia.org/
  • Mesa 3D Graphics Library: https://www.mesa3d.org/
  • Vulkan: https://www.vulkan.org/
  • lib.rs Graphics APIs:https://lib.rs/rendering/graphics-api
  • Reddit Minimal open-source library for cross-platform 2D graphics: https://www.reddit.com/r/cpp/comments/g13alk/minimal_opensource_library_for_crossplatform_2d/
  • OGRE - Open Source 3D Graphics Engine: https://www.ogre3d.org/
  • Diligent Engine: https://github.com/DiligentGraphics/DiligentEngine
